text: hey I'm Melissa Joan Hart you might know
me as Clarissa or Sabrina or from

when I got the role in Clarissa I

producer heard that I that he should
audition me he did not want to blonde
but after three auditions I went him
over and I got the part of Clara and I
played that character until I was about
seventeen and a half
basically graduating high school we were
on the Universal Studios lot we were
part of the tour the tour would go
through the studio you get to go taste
slime and gak and all these things so my
breaks were spent eating green pudding
and green apple sauce and stuff like
that I just remember being a lot of work
but I learned a lot too like walking
around the set and asking a lot of
questions about the equipment and
learning how everyone did their jobs
there so kind of basically it was like a
mini film school Clarissa was one of
those characters that girls wanted to be
and guys wanted to date and it was just
one of those things where she was just
cool and everyone liked her and
everybody wanted to be like her a lot of
people tell me that she started their

because of the computer design that was

always designing computer programs I

Wow this magic thing isn't so bad

people remember high school their entire

that's something I'll always be with me
Sabrina um a lot of people related to I

what's funny about Sabrina is like

called on the street like Sabrina
Sabrina hey Sabrina
- all of a sudden being called Melissa
and people started to know who I was
every actor wants to play an iconic role
that they'll be remembered for their
whole lives but then when you are you
realize that you've done a whole body of
work but that's all people seem to want
to talk about so it can be frustrating
at times but I've been really lucky
because I have played so many different

mother is my producing partner we have
our company heartbreak films when I was
little she would manage my career and
we've just done tons of movies together
and TV shows like Melissa and Joey but
then I decided I didn't want to be in a

was watching the woods

it's the first thing I've directed that
I'm not in and it's just a beautiful
movie and it's scary and it's fun and it

so I'm very excited to be a part of the

2016 and we brought the in the amazing
Angelica Houston with us and and we got

the scary movies it's gonna be like one

I just love being that kind of character
